name: HELLDRITCH: TOWER TOADALIZATION
description:
-Traverse through the tower of hell by toad jumping with the LEFT MOUSE BUTTON.

-Pause the game using ESC!

-Jump off walls to get a slight speed boost!

-Avoid the enemies!

-Shoot the eye at the top to win!

Made for a 2 week first-year game jam at the beginning of our game programming course!
